pull.title: Merge leveldb subtree
pull.body:
For review:

```sh
git fetch https://github.com/bitcoin-core/leveldb
./test/lint/git-subtree-check.sh src/leveldb
```

Closes #13860

issue.title: Increase maximum mmaps() used by each LevelDB instance from 1000 to 4096 on 64 bit systems.
issue.body:
By default LevelDB will only mmap() up to 1000 ldb files for reading, this default is arbitrarily small.

Once the first 1000 files are mmap()ed, it falls back to using file descriptor based IO which eventually
causes problems for handling new sockets due to the use of select(). Increasing the number of mmaps() used will hold off running into the 1024 file descriptor (default) limit for select().

- [x] Dashboard items @moneyball 

Note: I'll be AFK most of the day tomorrow (Monday), so please push changes without waiting to hear back from me.  I'll review later in the evening (EDT) when I get home.

issue.title: ibd memory usage up in 0.17
issue.body:
Just to track the memory usage issue caused by the leveldb subtree change in #13925

See also https://bitcoinperf.com/timeline/?exe=3%2C4%2C2%2C1&base=1%2B23&ben=reindex.522000.dbcache%3D2048.mem-usage&env=1&revs=50&equid=on&quarts=on&extr=on

issue.title: Update LevelDB to upstream commit f545dfabf
issue.body:
Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:

- bitcoin/bitcoin#7911
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7982
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8133
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8784
  - Only the missing changes.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8826
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8613
- bitcoin/bitcoin#10544
- bitcoin/bitcoin#10633
  - Only the changes to files and code we have.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#10806
- bitcoin/bitcoin#10958
- bitcoin/bitcoin#12451
- bitcoin/bitcoin#13925
- bitcoin/bitcoin#15270

This upgrades LevelDB in the exact same commit progression as upstream, up to January 2019.

labels.name: C-upstream-port
labels.description: Category: Changes that are ported from the Bitcoin Core codebase.
